channel.title: Banning me for a virus i didnt know about?
channel.description: Recently i posted a topic with a direct download to something i thought was legit cause i scanned it with microsoft security essentials and norton 360... Stupid me, but without being notified i am now on a ban-list. WHY? I do not want to be banned nor do i want to harm any users, i have talked it out with the person who reported me and even he doesn't believe me. I haven't ever coded a single thing in my life... let alone a virus. Hell i had no idea what this rat was until i googled it and i still don't know what it is :|. I have been accused of acting stupid just so i don't get banned, how do i convince the moderators to keep me from being banned i really meant no harm! The only reason i ever registered in the first place was to play minecraft!

item.title: Banning me for a virus i didnt know about?
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

You obviously aren’t banned, so stop whining and move on

Just don’t do anything like that again (I believe you did it accidentally)

Read full topic
item.source: Banning me for a virus i didnt know about?
